review: The installation instructions were a little confusing, and it took more effort to get it working than it should.  Just be aware that the Google Chrome extension is a critical component that must be on your computer or tablet. Once it was installed with the necessary software, we are able to download Netflix movies and TV shows on an iPad and watch them on our big screen TV.  Very happy with the product and the price is reasonable.

author: L. Robertson

review: I bought this product the instant Google announced that it was available. I already have an Xbox and a Playstation 3, so I'm already able to easily watch Netflix on my tv, but this product is still extremely useful!! When I'm hanging out with friends at home and a youtube video comes up in conversation, it's so easy to turn on my laptop, open up youtube, and throw it onto my tv using the Chromecast. It works just as seamlessly with my phone and my tablet!The streaming through the Chrome browser is what interested me most about this product -- it's still a little laggy and sometimes the audio and video are off, but it works 75-80% of the time. I'm sure this is something that Google will improve with software updates though, and they already have in the short time since this product became available!Set up is pretty quick -- it did have some trouble finding the network a few times, but eventually I got it to work, and there were step by step instructions along the way. All in all, this is already a great product, with even greater potential!! Everyone out there who doesn't have a Roku or Xbox or Smart TV should definitely buy this -- especially when it comes at such a great price!
